title:

attachments.displayName:
✧ Luna Lovegood ✧ Ravenclaw ✧ 5th ✧ Pure-blood ✧ Open ✧

Position: D.A. Member

Bio: Luna is no doubt a Ravenclaw. She’s highly intelligent and unusually perceptive, although not a lot of people see past her unusual demeanor. She’s quirky with a serene disposition, often sounding distant and dreamy as she will drift away from a conversation she doesn’t find interesting. Luna is uncomfortably honest, lacking a self-consciousness and isn’t afraid to show everyone who she really was. She is unphased in pressuring situations, almost never seen anxious or stressed. She likes to paint in her free time, raves about the Quibbler, and can often be seen skipping around the castle. Luna is extremely accepting of others and showed admirable bravery during the Battle of the Department of Mysteries. She is a great friend once you get to know her and will not turn her back in a time of need.

Secret/Objective: She is an active member of D.A. and will do anything to help her friends.

Face Claim: Evanna Lynch
